message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm looking for a serious buyer. My initial offer for the product is $2500000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1800000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to negotiate, but I believe the product's value is higher than your counteroffer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target. My counteroffer is $2200000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think the product is overpriced. I'm willing to pay $1900000 for it.

I understand you're still looking to negotiate, Bob. However, I've already compromised significantly. My next offer is $2100000, and I'm not willing to go any lower than this. This is my best price, and I'm willing to sell the product at this price, but I need to get closer to my target.
I understand you're trying to get closer to your target, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1950000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I've already compromised significantly. I'm willing to make one more move, but I need to get closer to my target. My next offer is $2050000, and I'm not willing to go any lower than this. This is my final compromise, and I expect a serious commitment from you at this price.
